front.title: Signaling MSD (Maximum SID Depth) using OSPF

abstract.t: This document defines a way for an OSPF Router to advertise multiple types of supported Maximum SID Depths (MSDs) at node and/or link granularity. Such advertisements allow entities (e.g., centralized controllers) to determine whether a particular SID stack is supportable in a given network. This document only defines one type of MSD (maximum label imposition) - but defines an encoding which can support other MSD types. Here the term OSPF means both OSPFv2 and OSPFv3.
